kw.name: New Browser

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page. A Page is the Playwright equivalent to a tab. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Page concept. Returns a stable identifier for the created page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: about:blank

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates to the given ``url``.

kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``. See the `Finding elements` section for details about the selectors.

kw.msg: delete from students where email = 'ricardo@theotokus.com'
insert into students(name, email, age, weight, feet_tall, created_at, updated_at)values('Ricardo de Mauro','ricardo@theotokus.com',34,98,1.75,NOW(),NOW());
